description: This file is the entry point for a React application, responsible for rendering the main App component into the DOM.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components in the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the DOM under the created root.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A wrapper component that activates additional checks and warnings for its children.
